title:
20c06 - "Outside
buyer" may qualify as an administrative employee.
text:
In
some instances it may be found that an employee may be properly exempt under
Sec 13(a)(1), if he meets the test provided in Reg 541, particularly with
regard to an administrative employee.
html:
Â 

In some instances it may be found that an employee may be properly exempt under Sec 13(a)(1), if he meets the test provided in Reg 541, particularly with regard to an administrative employee.
